post.content:
Contract Duration
6 months
Number of Positions Open
5
Start Date
ASAP
Posting Date
19-Mar-2009
Travel Required
Not Required
Educational Requirements
N/A
Additional Languages Required
English
Job Description
Our client who is part of the media industry, is looking for Java Developers (5 resources required) for an E-commerce Portal site for a Telecom company
They require the person to have the following skill sets
- Java - Eclipse - IDE - Tomcat 5.5 - MYSql
Strong communication skills
These individuals must be strong team players and able to meet tight deadlines.
Sujatha Kumar
Sujatha.Kumar@brainhunter.com Technical Recruiter t 416.225.9900 ext. 4392
post.title: [Cont.] Int. Java Developer, downtown Toronto
